def reverse(s):
    rev = 'MUTATED'
    i = len(s)
    while i > 0:
        rev += s[i - 1]
        i = i - 1
    return rev

def reverse(s):
    rev = ''
    i = len(s)
    while i >= 0:
        rev += s[i - 1]
        i = i - 1
    return rev

    rev = ''
    i = len(s)
    while i <= 0:
        rev += s[i - 1]
        i = i - 1
    return rev
